Resolved Question Show me another » Please help me! I need help ending my speech! My topic is on"Why Fast Food is Bad for You"? I need a conclusion by Friday! Please help! I just need a conclusion about"WHY FAST FOOD IS BAD FOR YOU!" Thanks for your help! 6 months ago Report Abuse by Matt Member since: September 30, 2010 Total points: 64,695 (Level 7) Badge Image: Contributing In: Photography Cancer Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Voters The way to wrap up your speech is to summarize your main points then restate your thesis, which is that fast food is bad for you.
So if you points were that it is high in fat, high in sodium, and generally is not a balanced diet, you might say:
"In conclusion, I would like to remind you that fast food is high in fat and high in sodium, both major contributing factors to cardiovascular disease. It is also very difficult to eat a balanced diet with fruits and vegetables if your primary source of nutrition is a fast food restaurant. With these factors, it is easy to see that fast food is not a healthy option for your diet." 6 months ago Report Abuse 100% 1 Vote 1 person rated this as good
